========================================
This course introduces the fundamentals of computer programming. Students will learn the essential components of computer language and the algorithms for coding. The goal is to help students feel confident mapping scientific problems into computational frameworks, designing mathematical algorithms, and writing and debugging programs for specific tasks. 

Language: Fortran 95/2003/2008/2018
schedule:
(01) Coding, program, and calculations
(02) Linux, bash commands, vim editor, compiler
(03) Algorithm and program structure
(05) Input and output, declaration, format
(06) Math operators and functions
(07) Do loop
(08) Logical control
(09) Array
(10) File
(11) Subroutine and module
(12) Numerical methods
(12) Numerical methods
(13) Numerical methods
(14-18) Course project
